description: If you're looking for a Bombshell of a cocktail, look no further than the F-Bomb. This mix of Fireball and energy drink will give you a jolt of&nbsp;energy, whether you're hitting the town or just trying to make it through the workday.The F-Bomb is perfect for those who like their drinks with a little bit of bite. The fiery flavor of the&nbsp;cinnamon liquor is complemented by the sweetness and fizziness of the energy drink, resulting in a tasty beverage.So next time you're feeling sluggish and need a pick-me-up, make an F-Bomb shot and enjoy!
name: F-Bomb

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Fireball whiskey into a shot glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Fireball whiskey into a shot glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the energy drink into a bigger glass, like a tumbler or a pint glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the energy drink into a bigger glass, like a tumbler or a pint glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Take the shot glass and drop it into the energy drink.
recipeInstructions.text: Take the shot glass and drop it into the energy drink.

recipeInstructions.name: Make sure to create a splash since this is the essence of bomb shots.
